dcterms:description: The dataset used for evaluating summarization systems, containing data from the Text Analysis Conference (TAC) evaluations from 2008 to 2011.

dcterms:description: The dataset used for the Automatically Evaluating Summaries of Peers (AESOP) task, which assesses the performance of summarization systems.
dcterms:title: AESOP (Automatically Evaluating Summaries of Peers)
